name: Cerberus Nightmare Chestpiece
description: Nightmare armor is worn by Cerberus Phantoms expecting long-range conflicts. Powerful capacitors deliver punishing energy to the Phantom's weapons, and circulating coolant in its gloves allows for more shots before a given thermal clip overheats. The remaining energy focuses on shield strength and regeneration time to help survivability.
feature: 10 shields (regen 10). --Increase your thermal clip capacity by 4.
setBonus: Set bonus (2 of 4): +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls. --Set bonus (3 of 4): +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls. --Set bonus (4 of 4): +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls.
notes: Shields, Shield Regen, Item Capacity, Set Bonus
